body:
## What's Changed
* Fixed hidden import error by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/228


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.9...1.9.10

## What's Changed
* Added default namespace support for Bedrock by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/225
* Fixed the pyinstaller hook to include data files by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/226
* Bumped level.dat version by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/227


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.8...1.9.9

* Removed dlls from build step
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.7...1.9.8

## What's Changed
* Add support for region file version 3 by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/220
* Added Block.join classmethod by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/219
* Import missing `bisect_left` function for Python version >= 3.10 by @mikelei8291 in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/223
* Moved leveldb to an external repository by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/224

## New Contributors
* @mikelei8291 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/223

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.6...1.9.7

* Fixed a corruption in Java chunks

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.5...1.9.6

## What's Changed
* Fixed nbt error by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/214
* Fixed biome bug by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/216
* Fix Bedrock chunk loading bug by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/218
* Rewritten the Java region class by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/186
* Replaced global cache db with a per level db by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/217


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.4...1.9.5

## What's Changed
* Fixed milisecond bug by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/211
* Fix chunk reject bug in Java 1.13.2 by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/212
* Handle some actors not having internalComponents by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/213


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.3...1.9.4

## What's Changed
* Simplified logging again by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/210


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.2...1.9.3

## What's Changed
* Fixed importing in tests by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/209
* Nbt 3 by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/208
* Improved logging support by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/183


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.9.1...1.9.2

* Fixed schematic AddBlocks by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/197
* Fixed default type for LastUpdate by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/200

* Only copy chunks to the new world if they are full chunks by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/193
* Fixed loading Bedrock chunks with no palette by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/194

1.7.5 was supposed to 1.8.0 but I made a mistake when writing the version number


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.7.5...1.8.0

## What's Changed
* Improved Java edition locking by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/185
* Moved the leveldb object out of the dimension class by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/187
* Fixed block palette stacking bug by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/188
* Repair leveldb databases before opening them by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/190
* Add support for Bedrock actor storage by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/189


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.7.3...1.7.5

Fixed version specifications
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.7.2...1.7.3

## What's Changed
* Added support for Bedrock chunk format 40 by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/184


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.7.1...1.7.2

## What's Changed
* Refactored Java interfaces and added temporary entity support by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/176
* Delete all cache directories that were created before a week ago by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/182


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.7.0...1.7.1

name: 1.7.1b0
body:
## What's Changed
Rewritten Java chunk interfaces to separate the components. This should make it easier to maintain since no two features are dependent on each other.
Added experimental entity support.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.7.0...1.7.1b0

## What's Changed
* Modified tests triggers by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/179
* Added block rotation by @gentlegiantJGC in https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/pull/178


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.6.2...1.7.0

## What's Changed
* Updated upper bound on anvil_2844.py to support 1.18.2's DataVersion by @Podshot 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.6.1...1.6.2

name: 1.7.0a1
body:
## Changes

### 1.7.0a1
* Added block rotation when pasting #178 

### 1.7.0a0
* Added a cython leveldb wrapper for a bit more speed #177 
* Rewritten the Java chunk interfaces to make maintenance much easier #176 
* Added in temporary entity support (Requires activating with the `--experimental-entity-support` command line input)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Amulet-Team/Amulet-Core/compare/1.6.1...1.7.0a1

name: 1.7.0a0
body:

body:

Use with caution.

name: Added support for Bedrock 1.17.30 worlds
body: Bedrock 1.17.30 changed the save format a bit.

name: Added support for Bedrock 1.17.30 worlds
body: Bedrock 1.17.30 changed the save format a bit.

name: Fixed a bug loading Java chunks
body: Fixed Amulet-Team/Amulet-Map-Editor/issues/365

name: 1.4.5 - Bug Fix
body:
Added a more backwards compatible leveldb library for macOS
Fixed an issue with structure_void in mcstructure files
Handled an issue with heightmaps
Cleaned up typing

Fixed an issue with 1.17 chunks taller than 512 blocks. Amulet-Team/Amulet-Map-Editor/issues/331
Fixed an issue converting 1.16 worlds to 1.13. Amulet-Team/Amulet-Map-Editor/issues/326
Added a better error message when trying to edit marketplace worlds.

name: Fixed a paste issue and optimised deleting chunks
body:
Fixed an issue in the paste tool causing chunks to not get copied.
Added an option to the delete chunks function to not load the original chunk.
This will speed up the operation a lot since most of the time undoing this does not matter.

name: Fixed creating levels and an issue with the Bedrock chunk
body:
Adds support for another Bedrock chunk version linked to the 1.18 toggle.
Fixes some issues with the new level bounds system and creating levels.

name: Partial Player Support
body:
Adds support for reading player location.
Some of the underlying managing system has been rewritten.

name: Documentation and API cleanup
body:
- Added documentation
- Cleaned up Entity and BlockEntity base class. Made abstract.
- Cleaned up the block class.
- Cache
  - Cleaned up the old cache system so that the old directories are not created.
  - Moved the world temp directory into the cache directory
  - Switched the cache directory to use the timestamp of when it was created.
    - This allows easy inspection of creation time.
    - This change should also enable Amulet-Team/Amulet-Map-Editor/issues/139 to be fixed.
- Switched biome state to an enum. This is backwards compatible.
- Removed the reference to the chunk from status. This was left from the old automatic undo detection logic.
- Switched the status version to an enum.
- Removed some unused exceptions.
- Renamed `LevelDoesNotExist` to `DimensionDoesNotExist` to be more clear.
- Made the base history classes abstract and cleaned up.
- Level classes
  - Removed some depreciated methods.
  - Removed run_operation method. Code should just directly implement this logic.
  - Clean up.
- Changed palette blocks and biomes methods to properties.
- Selection
  - Added a abstract base selection class to force a consistent API between box and group.
  - Cleaned up box and group to be more consistent.
  - Modified box methods to return group rather than list of boxes.
  - Modified group to take any iterable of box.
- Removed some depreciated methods from the format wrapper classes.
- Renamed world_name to level_name in the format wrapper.
- Added typing to the leveldb API.

name: Documentation and API cleanup
body:
- Added documentation
- Cleaned up Entity and BlockEntity base class. Made abstract.
- Cleaned up the block class.
- Cache
  - Cleaned up the old cache system so that the old directories are not created.
  - Moved the world temp directory into the cache directory
  - Switched the cache directory to use the timestamp of when it was created.
    - This allows easy inspection of creation time.
    - This change should also enable Amulet-Team/Amulet-Map-Editor/issues/139 to be fixed.
- Switched biome state to an enum. This is backwards compatible.
- Removed the reference to the chunk from status. This was left from the old automatic undo detection logic.
- Switched the status version to an enum.
- Removed some unused exceptions.
- Renamed `LevelDoesNotExist` to `DimensionDoesNotExist` to be more clear.
- Made the base history classes abstract and cleaned up.
- Level classes
  - Removed some depreciated methods.
  - Removed run_operation method. Code should just directly implement this logic.
  - Clean up.
- Changed palette blocks and biomes methods to properties.
- Selection
  - Added a abstract base selection class to force a consistent API between box and group.
  - Cleaned up box and group to be more consistent.
  - Modified box methods to return group rather than list of boxes.
  - Modified group to take any iterable of box.
- Removed some depreciated methods from the format wrapper classes.
- Renamed world_name to level_name in the format wrapper.
- Added typing to the leveldb API.

name: Documentation and API cleanup
body: This adds documentation to all of the public facing code and cleans up a lot of small things I found as I added documentation.

name: Optimise Clone logic
body:
Optimised the clone logic. It now runs over 70 times faster than it previously did.
Switched `type` calls to `isinstance` calls
Added ABC as a subclass of FormatWrapper

name: Added core features for upgraded paste tool
body:
It adds a function to decompose a transformation matrix back to translation, rotation and scale.
Added a method to the SelectionBox to check if it entirely contains another selection box.
Added logic to rotate a SelectionGroup and SelectionBox by arbitrary rotations not just 90 degree increments.

name: Added iter methods for creating undo points
Sponge Schematic and selection fixes
body:
Fixes for the sponge schematic format.
Slight modification to the SelectionGroup class.

name: Amulet core v1.2
body:
Updated the windows leveldb libraries to fix some issues.
Fixed some issues with height and light values.
Added support for the Sponge Schematic format.

name: Minor Fixes and changes
body:
Modified the behaviour of the Chunk pickle methods.
Added methods to unload all cached data.

name: Minor Fixes
body:
Added some sanity checking for leveldb to make sure it exists in the correct path.
Added a tuple of air-like blocks

name: PyInstaller Compatability
body: Improves compatibility with PyInstaller

Added:
- Support for the Bedrock v22 chunk
- Methods to create all level objects from scratch
- Create level tests
- Updated leveldb library

Fixed
- Improved thread safety of the chunk mananger
- Improved chunk loading to better support modded and new data.

name: Selection Redesign
body:
This redesigns the selection classes to be immutable to make various things easier.
It also adds a number of methods to them to enable merging selections.

name: 1.1.0b4 - Threading and Java chunk fix
body: This is a minor release with fixes for a threading issue with Java worlds and a minor issue writing Java chunk block palettes.

name: 1.1.0b3 - Minor Fixes
body:
Fixed an issue handling heightmaps. This should fix converting heightmaps from 1.16 to 1.15.
Fixed an issue pasting structures.
Fixed an issue exporting mcstructure files.

name: 1.1.0b2 - Threading Fix
body: This is a minor release to fix a bug with chunk loading with Java worlds related to a thread race condition.

name: 1.0.0.2 - Threading Fix
body: This is a minor release to fix a bug with chunk loading with Java worlds related to a thread race condition.

name: 1.1.0b1 - Structure Interface Rewrite
body:
Rewrote the world and structure logic systems to be more similar in how they are dynamically loaded. 

## Changes
- Moved formats, interfaces, and chunk translators to `amulet.level`
- Created a more streamlined loader
- Removed meta files and replaced the functionality with `__init__.py` (see #95 for information on this change)
- Structures can now be loaded with the same process and worlds
- The `load_world()` function and be replaced by `load_level()`

name: 1.1.0b0 - Structure redesign
body:
This release redesigns how structures are handled within Amulet.
The original structure API has been removed and replaced with a new class that behaves the same as worlds.

`amulet.api.level.BaseLevel` is a new class that implements all of the logic shared by both worlds and structures which is mostly the chunk based logic. For typing this should generally replace the `World` type unless the code in question only deals with a World class.
`amulet.api.level.World` is equivalent to the old `World` class.
`amulet.api.level.Structure` exists to wrap structure objects in the same way that the `World` class wraps worlds.
`amulet.api.level.ImmutableStructure` exists to replace the functionality of the old structure class. This is useful for extracting data from a world because it does not need a `Format` class to exist.

These changes mean that structures can be modified in the same way that worlds are. The plugins written for worlds will now also work on structures

Added methods to enable creation of structures from scratch. The same logic for worlds will follow

Lots more things
